text: Diggah Yallih xaqul lawcal macfuuzul alsittê loowo taban kee namma alsa takke, Yalli qaranwaa kee baaxó gine ayró, affara alsi (qarfa baahe, qarfa, qashuura, ragaaba) kak seemat leeh kay addat qeb abaanam Yalli carammoyseh toh massale diiniy mako sinni kinni toysa moominiiney tama alsittet sinni nafsi madlamina korosû luk inkih oomiya usun inkih siinî luk kah yaamen innaah diggah Yalli catoh isik meesita marâ luk yanim ixiga
